verbose_text: There was a substantial reduction in the level of nitrogen dioxide (NO 2 : 0.00002 mol m -2), a low reduction in CO (< 0.03 mol m -2), and a low-to-moderate reduction in Aerosol Optical Depth (AOD : ~ 0.1-0.2) in the major hotspots of COVID-19 outbreak during February-March 2020, which may be attributed to the mass lockdowns.
